html:
Dec 7 (Reuters) - Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O:

  • AWS SAYS HAVE MITIGATED THE UNDERLYING ISSUE THAT CAUSED SOME NETWORK DEVICES IN THE US-EAST-1 REGION TO BE IMPAIRED

  • AWS SAYS SEEING IMPROVEMENT IN AVAILABILITY ACROSS MOST AWS SERVICES

  • AWS SAYS ALL SERVICES ARE NOW INDEPENDENTLY WORKING THROUGH SERVICE-BY-SERVICE RECOVERY

  • AWS SAYS CONTINUE TO WORK TOWARD FULL RECOVERY FOR ALL IMPACTED AWS SERVICES AND API OPERATIONS

Source text for Eikon: [ID:]

Further company coverage: AMZN.O
